project_abstract.cdata: The primary objective of the Loess Plateau Watershed Rehabilitation Project is to increase agricultural production and incomes on 15,600 km2 of land in the Loess Plateau in tributary watershed of the Yellow River. A secondary objective, which is to reduce sediment inflows to the Yellow River, will be achieved by locating the project areas in the parts of the Basin with severe soil erosion. The project will (a) create sustainable crop production on high-yielding level farmland and thereby replace the areas devoted to crops on erodible slope lands, (b) plant the slope lands to a range of trees, shrubs an grasses for the land stabilization and production of much-needed fuel, timber and fodder; and (c) substantially reduce sediment runoff from slope lands and gullies in the nine watersheds through the construction of sediment retention dams.

P003540.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>黄土高原水土保持项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是提高黄河支流流域黄土高原1.56万平方公里土地的农业生产能力和收入，次要目标是降低入黄泥沙量，为此将把项目区定在黄河流域水土流失严重的地区。本项目将：（1）建立高产农田的可持续农作物生产模式，从而取代用于在水土易流失坡地上种植农作物的地区；（2）在坡地上植树种草，以稳定土壤，生产人们急需的薪柴、木材和饲料；（3）通过修建淤地坝大幅减少9个小流域坡地和沟壑的泥沙径流量。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
